description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. The Exciting Runic Puzzle Game Enters the world of 3D.  Play accross five different quests and over 48 levels to prove you have what it takes to enter Valhalla. Co-operatively solve the puzzles with a friend or go it alone.  Earn the approval of all the norse gods and use your trophies to unlock the final toughest challenges.
description.short: The Exciting Runic Puzzle Game Enters the world of 3D.  Play accross five different quests and over 48 levels to prove you have what it takes to enter Valhalla. Co-operatively solve the puzzles with a friend or go it alone.  Earn the approval of all the norse gods and use your trophies to unlock the final toughest challenges.
